name: Abbreviated Labels
author: iAndyHD3
description: Changes numbers such as "100000" to "100k".

name: Auto Pause
author: Alphalaneous
description: A simple mod that makes the game automatically pause when losing focus or resizing in windowed mode.

name: Better Edit
author: HJFod
description: A ton of fixes and improvements in the editor.

name: Better Info
author: Cvolton
description: Adds a lot of extra info to the game.

name: Better Pause
author: TpdEA
description: This mod improves the pause mode with new additions, such as quick settings, directly built-in quest menu and improved volume settings.

name: Better Save
author: Alphalaneous
description: Auto save profile info to server after exiting the game.

name: Bonk
author: config
description: Funny mod that plays a bonk sound whenever you bonk your head against a solid object.

name: Checkpoint Fix
author: Figment
description: Fix checkpoint momentum.

name: Clipboard Fix
author: adafcaefc
description: Fix copying ID in the level description.

name: Demons in Garage
author: Alphalaneous
description: Add demons to icon select screen.

name: Fade music on death
author: config
description: Makes music not just stop after a death but fades it like in osu!.

name: GDH
author: tobyadd
description: FOSS Mod Menu by tobyadd. Contains bare minimum for comfort playing. Currently not being developed.

name: GDShare
author: HJFod
description: Save levels to files.

name: Geometry Cache
author: config
description: Use .qoi compression instread of .png.

name: Icon Kit Saver
author: HJFod
description: Save icon kits of other players and load them anytime.

name: Input Lag Fix
author: syzzi
description: Fix Geometry Dash 1 frame input lag.

name: Invisible Dual Fix
author: HJFod
description: Fixes the other icon sometimes being invisible while in a dual.

name: Low Capacity Fix
author: Cvolton
description: Fixes optimisation issue that rub broke.

name: Menu Shaders
author: MatCool
description: Allows you to cahnge menu background to shader.

name: Orb Fix
author: MatCool
description: Fixes orbs not being pressed in practice mode, only useful for zBot as most bots have it included.

name: TextureLDR
author: poweredbypie
description: Adds texture pack managment like in minecraft.
